name: airCloudHome
0:
”Alexa, open air cloud”
”turn on AC”
”set to cooling”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air cloud
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill, you can operate Hitachi Air Conditioner with voice.
In order to use the skill, you need to link an account created with "airCloud Home app" in advance.
Tap the "Enable" button and enter the account ID and password used for the "Aircloud Home app" on the displayed screen.
Note:
* If you use your account ID as a phone number, replace the first 0 with +XX (country code). For example, the ID of 090-xxxx-XXXX is + 8190xxxxXXXX.
* If you have not created an account, install the "Aircloud Home App" on your smartphone and create an account and register an air conditioner. 
* Air conditioners that can be operated with only AirCloud Home app are eligible.

● What you can do with voice control
On / Off 
Operation Mode
Set Temperature Change
Adjust Set Temperature
Fan Speed 
Operation Status Notification
Air flow / Wind direction

● Example of operation utterance
→Before sending any command please say "Open airCloud" then try below command.

Turn on the living AC
Set living AC cool mode
Set 16 degrees in living
Decrease 5 degrees in living AC
Set fan speed level 1 in living AC
Set living AC horizontal swing

● Example of operation status
→Before sending any command please say "Open airCloud" then try below command.

What is the current operation mode of living AC?
Tell me the living AC fan speed.
Tell me all the operation status of living AC.

* When operating, Please specify the name of the air conditioner such as "living" or "bedroom".
* The name of the air conditioner needs to be the same as registered with the airCloud Home app.
* If you change your ID password with the "airCloud Home App", please re-link your account.
